description: Accused of the murder of his wife, Andrew Dufresne, after being sentenced to life imprisonment, is sent to Shawshank prison. Over the years, he managed to gain the trust of the centre's director and the respect of his fellow inmates, especially Red, the head of the bribery mafia.
status_description: Fear makes you a prisoner. Only hope can set you free.
lead_source_description: Fear makes you weak. Only strength can free you.
